X-Armed Bandit Algorithms¶

Truncated HOO Algorithm¶

class algos.HOO.T_HOO(nu=1, rho=0.5, rounds=1000, domain=None, partition=None)¶

Bases: PyXAB.algos.Algo.Algorithm

__init__(nu=1, rho=0.5, rounds=1000, domain=None, partition=None)¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

optTraverse()¶

Traverse the exploration tree to find the best path and the best node to pull at this moment.

curr_node: Node

The last node selected by the algorithm

path: List of Node

The best path to traverse the partition selected by the algorithm

pull(time)¶

Every algorithm needs a function to pull a node.

time: int

The time step of the online process.

chosen_point: list

The point chosen by the algorithm

receive_reward(time, reward)¶

Every algorithm needs a function to receive the reward.

time: int

The time step of the online process.

reward: float

The (Stochastic) reward of the pulled point
